member.name: T:ExamMainProject.ControlCenter.ValidationControl
member.summary: This class allows you to maintain control of the whole project. 1. You can easily turn on/off property integer and string validations when needed. 2. Here Regex validation patterns could be implemented and changed. 3. The global round delay can also be changed here.
